blogPost.excerpt: Total.js Platform is a collection of libraries, packages, UI components, practices, and complete products written in pure JavaScript. Most of our libraries and UI components are without any 3rd party dependencies. Website: https://www.totaljs.com
blogPost.body: Total.js Platform is a collection of libraries, packages, UI components, practices, and complete products written in pure JavaScript. Most of our libraries and UI components are without any 3rd party dependencies. Website: https://www.totaljs.com
blogPost.title: Total.js Platform - Open-source JavaScript platform
blogPost.author: Peter Širka

localize.description: Total.js平台是一个用纯JavaScript编写的库、包、UI组件、实践和完整产品的集合。我们的大部分库和UI组件都没有任何第三方的依赖。网站：https://www.totaljs.com
Total.js平臺是一個用純JavaScript編寫的庫、包、UI組件、實踐和完整產品的集合。我們的大部分庫和UI組件都沒有任何第三方的依賴。網站：https://www.totaljs.com

previous.excerpt: 🏴 Flagpack is an open source project of 260+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Download for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD (coming soon) or install for React, Vue or Angular (coming soon).
previous.title: Flagpack - Stunning open source flag icons for your digital product

localize.description: 旗帜包是一个开源项目，它为您的数字产品提供了260多个令人惊叹的旗帜图标。可以在您的设计或代码项目中轻松实现。下载Figma、Sketch和Adobe XD（即将推出）或安装React、Vue或Angular（即将推出）。
localize.tagline: 为您的数字产品提供令人惊叹的开源旗帜图标。

localize.description: 旗幟包是一個開源項目，它爲您的數字產品提供了260多個令人驚歎的旗幟圖標。可以在您的設計或代碼項目中輕鬆實現。下載Figma、Sketch和Adobe XD（即將推出）或安裝React、Vue或Angular（即將推出）。
localize.tagline: 爲您的數字產品提供令人驚歎的開源旗幟圖標。

next.excerpt: Create your personal page and sell your services for Instagram and TikTok. Easily manage collaborations, receive messages from brands, and get paid directly to your bank account.
next.title: Collabstr - A personal page to sell your Instagram & TikTok services

localize.description: 创建你的个人页面，并为Instagram和TikTok销售你的服务。轻松管理合作，接收来自品牌的消息，并直接从你的银行账户中获得报酬。
localize.tagline: 销售Instagram和TikTok服务的个人页面。

localize.description: 創建你的個人頁面，併爲Instagram和TikTok銷售你的服務。輕鬆管理合作，接收來自品牌的消息，並直接從你的銀行賬戶中獲得報酬。
localize.tagline: 銷售Instagram和TikTok服務的個人頁面。
